alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 05 at 3:31PM EDT until June 06 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Bronx, Northwest Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk, Northern Queens and Northern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 2 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS... Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. LITTLE NECK BAY AT KINGS POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 10.0 FT, MODERATE 10.5 FT, MAJOR 13.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.2 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 5.2 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 05/12 PM 8.6/ 9.1 0.8/ 1.3 1.4/ 1.9 1 NONE 06/01 AM 9.9/10.4 2.1/ 2.6 1.1/ 1.6 0 MINOR 06/01 PM 8.9/ 9.4 1.1/ 1.6 1.5/ 2.0 0-1 NONE 07/01 AM 9.7/10.2 1.9/ 2.3 1.5/ 2.0 1 NONE 07/02 PM 8.8/ 9.3 1.0/ 1.5 1.4/ 1.9 1 NONE 08/02 AM 9.5/10.0 1.7/ 2.2 1.5/ 2.0 1 NONE FLAX POND AT OLD FIELD NY MLLW CATEGORIES -
